0d924167-ac6b-4148-ad53-d67db5d1d0ef.name: Frequency: Constantly
0d924167-ac6b-4148-ad53-d67db5d1d0ef.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

1cc91c81-6ef6-443b-8b1d-bb8ba6d959e1.name: Frequency: Hourly
1cc91c81-6ef6-443b-8b1d-bb8ba6d959e1.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

62b32abd-92ba-4dbb-a8ab-862b980b9e84.name: Frequency: Daily
62b32abd-92ba-4dbb-a8ab-862b980b9e84.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

15ffac36-8027-4247-971a-e57c33619834.name: Frequency: Weekly
15ffac36-8027-4247-971a-e57c33619834.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

c01c07e6-45dc-4fd7-b8a5-482a88de1150.name: Frequency: Monthly
c01c07e6-45dc-4fd7-b8a5-482a88de1150.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

8c365926-544b-447e-bab6-42a98eddaea6.name: Frequency: Seasonally
8c365926-544b-447e-bab6-42a98eddaea6.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

30f7b0a2-488a-4151-999a-d77400f4fb03.name: Frequency: Yearly
30f7b0a2-488a-4151-999a-d77400f4fb03.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

099cbe72-a592-4720-8482-1ba9bfa813d2.name: Aging
099cbe72-a592-4720-8482-1ba9bfa813d2.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

abaa7d5b-3420-44b3-ada1-a859a46ee37e.name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
abaa7d5b-3420-44b3-ada1-a859a46ee37e.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group
